Description: Rectangular sandstone statue base with Hieroglyphic text running around the edge including the cartouches of Nakhtnebef.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt), Medinet Habu (?)
Curator's comments: “A Theban Statue Base from the reign of Nekhtnebef” in T. Schneider and K. Szpakowska (eds), Egyptian Stories. A British Egyptological Tribute to Alan B. Lloyd on the Occasion of His Retirement (AOAT 347; Münster, 2007): 373–91.
To be included in the 'Musee achemenide virtuel et interactif' (see www.achemenet.com).
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
